sentence: What did the ship captain say when his son learned to float ? thats my buoy !
explanation: A buoy is a floating device used to mark a position in the water.
first_new_sentence: The buoy was placed in the water to help guide the boat through the channel.
second_new_sentence: The boy was excited to learn how to swim in the lake during summer.

sentence: What kind of robbery is not dangerous? a safe robbery.
explanation: A safe is a secure lockable box used for securing valuable items.
first_new_sentence: They stored all their important documents in the safe at home.
second_new_sentence: The children felt safe playing in the fenced yard.
